title: Dacor Distinctive Series Gas Range DR30GISNG Overview
description:
Buy Dacor Distinctive Series Gas Range DR30GISNG - http://www.abt.com/product/68741/Dacor-DR30GISNG.html

Features:
• Contemporary Distinctive™ Design with Stainless Steel Finish 
• Epicure Handle
• Angled Control Panel for easy viewing 
• Dedicated Illumina™ Indicator Lights glow Dacors signature flame-blue to always let you know when the burner and the oven are on 
• Professional heavy-duty die cast Stainless Steel Knobs with metallic finish for a contemporary style 
• Blue LED push-button switches for Convection Fan and Oven Light 
• SimmerSear™ Burner provides up to 18000 BTU and achieves ultra-low temperatures for simmering and melting without any scorching 
• Burner Configuration
o 1 Simmer SearTM Burner (800-18000 BTU) 
o 1 Sealed Gas Burner (9500 BTU) 
o 2 Sealed Gas Burners (15000 BTU) 
• Perma-Flame™ Technology automatically re-ignites a flame for continuous heating and uninterrupted cooking should a burner unexpectedly go out 
• Exclusive SmartFlame™ Technology reduces flame contact with grate to prevent grate discoloration and increase longevity 
• (2) Exclusive 14 Extra Wide Continuous Platform Grates are porcelain coated and easily accommodate extra-large pots and pans simultaneously 
• Sealed Porcelain Enameled Cooktop Spill Basin for easy clean-up and longevity 
• 4.8 cu.ft. Oven Capacity - one of the largest interiors in the market today 
• 4 Cooking Modes: Convection Bake Convection Broil Bake and Broil 
• Three-Part Convection System with fan air baffle and convection filter 
• Broil Burner with 14000 BTU 
• Stainless Steel Bake Burner with 25000 BTU 
• 1 GlideRacks™ with Easy Pull Handles are adjustable to 7 rack positions and removable for easy cleaning 
• Large Clear Tempered Glass Oven Window and Halogen Lighting (20W) for a clear view of whats cooking 
• Freestanding models (DR30G/DR30GF) ship with 6 Backguard and full-depth side panels 
• Slide-in models (DR30GI/DR30GIF) for slide-in or island configurations ship with 1-3/4 Low-Profile Backguard and 3-1/4 side panels 
• Compatible with all overhead Dacor Ventilation Hoods
• Raised Ventilation Compatible (ERV3015)
